mapper.select: select br.RULE_ID as ruleId , br.WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId , br.CONDITION_TYPE as conditionType , br.CONDITION_VALUE_1 as conditionValue1 , br.CONDITION_VALUE_2 as conditionvalue2 , br.PRIORITY as priority , br.STATUS as status , br.BU_ID as buId , br.CREATED_DATE as createdDate , br.CREATED_BY as createdBy , concat(cr.FIRST_NAME,' ',cr.LAST_NAME) as createdByName , br.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate , br.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy , concat(upd.FIRST_NAME,' ',upd.LAST_NAME) as updatedByName , br.SYSTEM_ID as systemId , tws.SYSTEM_NAME as systemName from tb_wf_business_rule br left join tb_user cr on cr.ID =br.CREATED_BY left join tb_user upd on upd.ID =br.UPDATED_BY left join tb_workflow_system tws on br.SYSTEM_ID=tws.SYSTEM_ID where br.WORKFLOW_ID = #{workflowId} and br.STATUS='Active' order by br.SYSTEM_ID,br.PRIORITY
